properties.Title: Tornado Warning In Effect
properties.Summary:
Description: Environment Canada meteorologists are tracking a severe thunderstorm with a history of producing tornadoes. At 5:06 PM CST Doppler RADAR indicated that this tornadic thunderstorm was located about 5 km south of Lafleche and was moving toward the southeast at 20 km/h. In addition to a tornado, this severe thunderstorm is capable of producing baseball-sized hail and wind gusts in excess of 120 km/h. Between 4:34 PM and 5:00 CST multiple tornado reports were received. At 4:05 PM the public reported softball-sized hail southwest of Glenbain. ### This is a dangerous and potentially life-threatening situation. Tornado warnings are issued when imminent or occurring thunderstorms are likely to produce or are producing tornadoes.
Expires: 2020-07-05T00:35:22-00:00
Originated from CAP Alert: Environment Canada, 2020-07-04T23:08:22-00:00, urn:oid:2.49.0.1.124.3935942454.2020
Area: R.M. of Wood River including Lafleche Woodrow and Melaval, R.M. of Stonehenge including Limerick and Congress
properties.Author: Environment Canada

properties.Title: Severe Thunderstorm Warning In Effect
properties.Summary:
Description: Environment Canada meteorologists are tracking an area of severe thunderstorms capable of producing quarter-sized hail and wind gusts in excess of 90 km/h. At 5:20 PM CST Doppler RADAR, satellite images and lightning detection indicate that this area of severe thunderstorms is located from 30 km north La Ronge to 40 km south of Buffalo Narrows, to Meadow Lake to 20 km east of Green Lake and is moving toward the northeast at 30 km/h. ### Large hail can damage property and cause injury. Strong wind gusts can toss loose objects, damage weak buildings, break branches off trees and overturn large vehicles.
Expires: 2020-07-05T02:22:12-00:00
Originated from CAP Alert: Environment Canada, 2020-07-04T23:25:12-00:00, urn:oid:2.49.0.1.124.4011215060.2020
Area: R.M. of Meadow Lake including Waterhen Res., Green Lake, Buffalo Narrows and Peter Pond Lake, Île à la Crosse and Beauval, Hwy 165 between hwys 2 and 914 including Pinehouse Lake, Lac la Ronge Prov. Park including La Ronge
properties.Author: Environment Canada

properties.Title: Severe Thunderstorm Watch In Effect
properties.Summary:
Description: Conditions are favourable for the development of severe thunderstorms that may be capable of producing strong wind gusts, large hail and heavy rain. ### Large hail can damage property and cause injury. Strong wind gusts can toss loose objects, damage weak buildings, break branches off trees and overturn large vehicles. Remember, severe thunderstorms can produce tornadoes. Severe thunderstorm watches are issued when atmospheric conditions are favourable for the development of thunderstorms that could produce one or more of the following: large hail, damaging winds, torrential rainfall. Please continue to monitor alerts and forecasts issued by Environment Canada. To report severe weather, send an email to NBstorm@canada.ca or tweet reports using #NBStorm.
Expires: 2020-07-05T01:57:38-00:00
Originated from CAP Alert: Environment Canada, 2020-07-04T21:48:38-00:00, urn:oid:2.49.0.1.124.2236310140.2020
Area: Fredericton and Southern York County, Oromocto and Sunbury County, Grand Lake and Queens County
properties.Author: Environment Canada

properties.Title: Tornado Warning In Effect
properties.Summary:
Description: At 6:56 p.m. Eastern Daylight Time Saturday, Environment Canada has issued a tornado warning for Northeastern Ontario. Extra care and attention should be exercised in and around the following localities: Fraserdale and Pledger Lake. Environment Canada meteorologists are tracking a severe thunderstorm that is possibly producing a tornado. Damaging winds, large hail and locally intense rainfall are also possible.
Expires: 2020-07-05T00:25:44-00:00
Originated from CAP Alert: Environment Canada, 2020-07-04T22:56:44-00:00, urn:oid:2.49.0.1.124.3651718516.2020

properties.Title: Severe Thunderstorm Warning In Effect
properties.Summary:
Description: At 7:23 p.m. EDT, Environment Canada meteorologists are tracking a severe thunderstorm capable of producing very strong wind gusts, up to toonie size hail and heavy rain. ### Heavy downpours can cause flash floods and water pooling on roads. Large hail can damage property and cause injury. Strong wind gusts can toss loose objects, damage weak buildings, break branches off trees and overturn large vehicles. Severe thunderstorm warnings are issued when imminent or occurring thunderstorms are likely to produce or are producing one or more of the following: large hail, damaging winds, torrential rainfall.
Expires: 2020-07-05T02:22:18-00:00
Originated from CAP Alert: Environment Canada, 2020-07-04T23:23:18-00:00, urn:oid:2.49.0.1.124.3921890369.2020
Area: Fraserdale - Pledger Lake
properties.Author: Environment Canada

properties.Title: Severe Thunderstorm Warning In Effect
properties.Summary:
Description: At 4:33 p.m. MDT, Environment Canada meteorologists are tracking a severe thunderstorm capable of producing very strong wind gusts, up to nickel size hail and heavy rain. At 4:33 p.m. MDT, Environment Canada meteorologists are tracking a line of severe thunderstorms capable of producing very strong wind gusts, up to nickel size hail and heavy rain. This line of thunderstorm is located from 15 km southwest of Castor to 10 km west of Galahad and is heading to the northeast at 30 km/h. ### Large hail can damage property and cause injury. Strong wind gusts can toss loose objects, damage weak buildings, break branches off trees and overturn large vehicles. Severe thunderstorm warnings are issued when imminent or occurring thunderstorms are likely to produce or are producing one or more of the following: large hail, damaging winds, torrential rainfall.
Expires: 2020-07-05T01:10:44-00:00
Originated from CAP Alert: Environment Canada, 2020-07-04T22:34:44-00:00, urn:oid:2.49.0.1.124.0323244825.2020
Area: Co. of Paintearth near Halkirk and Big Knife Prov. Park, Flagstaff Co. near Forestburg and Galahad, Co. of Paintearth near Castor and Fleet, Flagstaff Co. near Alliance and Bellshill Lake
properties.Author: Environment Canada

properties.Title: Severe Thunderstorm Warning In Effect
properties.Summary:
Description: At 4:24 p.m. CST, Environment Canada meteorologists are tracking a cluster of severe thunderstorms capable of producing very strong wind gusts, up to toonie size hail and heavy rain. These storms are currently encompassing an area near Turtle Lake, west of Green Lake and near Chitek Lake. ### Heavy downpours can cause flash floods and water pooling on roads. Large hail can damage property and cause injury. Strong wind gusts can toss loose objects, damage weak buildings, break branches off trees and overturn large vehicles. Remember, severe thunderstorms can produce tornadoes. Severe thunderstorm warnings are issued when imminent or occurring thunderstorms are likely to produce or are producing one or more of the following: large hail, damaging winds, torrential rainfall.
Expires: 2020-07-05T00:56:18-00:00
Originated from CAP Alert: Environment Canada, 2020-07-04T22:25:18-00:00, urn:oid:2.49.0.1.124.2074154633.2020
Area: R.M. of Meadow Lake including Waterhen Res., R.M. of Big River including Big River and Chitek Lake
properties.Author: Environment Canada

properties.Title: Severe Thunderstorm Warning In Effect
properties.Summary:
Description: At 6:21 p.m. EDT, Environment Canada meteorologists are tracking a severe thunderstorm capable of producing very strong wind gusts, up to toonie size hail and heavy rain. This area of severe thunderstorms is located from 95 kilometres north of Fraserdale to 65 kilometres northwest of Fraserdale to 20 kilometres northwest of Fraserdale, moving southeast at 60 km/h. Locations impacted include: Fraserdale, Coral, Relay, Ranoke and Abitibi Canyon. ### Large hail can damage property and cause injury. Severe thunderstorm warnings are issued when imminent or occurring thunderstorms are likely to produce or are producing one or more of the following: large hail, damaging winds, torrential rainfall.
Expires: 2020-07-05T01:05:27-00:00
Originated from CAP Alert: Environment Canada, 2020-07-04T22:22:27-00:00, urn:oid:2.49.0.1.124.1625403812.2020
Area: Fraserdale - Pledger Lake, Little Abitibi - Kesagami Lake
properties.Author: Environment Canada
